<xml>
  <block type="controls_if" id="246">

    <value name="IF0">

    </value>
    <statement name="DO0">

          <block type="math_number" id="252">
            <field name="NUM">1.0</field>
          </block>
        </value>
      </block>
    </statement>
    <value name="IF1">
      <block type="logic_compare" id="253">

            <field name="VAR">book.publisher.rank</field>

    </value>
    <statement name="DO1">

            </value>
          </block>
        </value>
      </block>
    </statement>
    <statement name="ELSE">

          <block type="logic_compare" id="262">

            </value>

        </value>
        <statement name="DO0">

                </value>

                    <field name="NUM">4.0</field>

              </block>
            </value>
          </block>
        </statement>
        <value name="IF1">
          <block type="logic_compare" id="271">

              <block type="business_logic_function" id="272">

title: Increase book publisher rank
description: Increase book publisher rank on book view
